data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Fathinia, Behzad, Rastegar-Pouyani, Eskandar, Rastegar-Pouyani, Nasrullah, Darvishnia, Hamid (2017): A new species of the genus Rhynchocalamus Günther, 1864 (Reptilia: Squamata: Colubridae) from Ilam province in western Iran. Zootaxa 4282 (3): 473-486, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4282.3.3|3 occurrences
